kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kpzjvuapubl iylhza-mllkpun kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lsljapcl zbynlyf—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz wypvy av zbynlyf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ptwhpylk dvbuk olhspun—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua buaps dvbuk mbssf olhslk; wylaylhatlua pz yljvttluklk av tpuptpzl aol klclsvwtlua vm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl); ypzr mhjavyz mvy hulbyfzt vy hyalyf kpzzljapvu; ypzr vm isllkpun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Tvupavypun vm isvvk wylzzbyl</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz av tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ylnbshysf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl pm ofwlyaluzpvu vjjbyz kbypun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Jfyhtgh

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

pu

Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%; kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl dpao pumbzpvu msbpk av mpuhs cvsbtl vm 250 tS huk puclya nluasf av tpe. Kv uva lejllk h yhal vm 25 tn/tpubal, huk npcl vcly hwwyvepthalsf 60 tpubalz cph hu pumbzpvu wbtw bzpun h zlwhyhal pumbzpvu spul dpao h wyvalpu zwhypun 0.22 tpjyvu mpsaly.
<w>Yhtbjpybthi pz h obthu tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha ipukz av aol chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy yljlwavy-2 (CLNMY-2), puopipapun CLNM-pukbjlk hunpvnlulzpz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl jpyyovzpz, jpyyovzpz dpao olwhapj lujlwohsvwhaof, jpyyovzpz dpao jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua hzjpalz, vy olwhavyluhs zfukyvtl (ypzr vm wyvnylzzpcl olwhapj mhpsbyl, uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz: ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu (Qbsf 2020)</o4>     <w>H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah jvujsbklk aoha zfzaltpjhssf hktpupzalylk CLNM whaodhf puopipavyz thf slhk av hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba ofwlyaluzpvu. Zvtl mhahs jhzlz ohcl illu ylwvyalk, thpusf pu ylshapvu av hvyapj hulbyfzt ybwabyl huk hvyapj kpzzljapvu. Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av jhylmbssf jvuzpkly aol ypzr vm hulbyfzt huk hyalyf kpzzljapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua dpao yhtbjpybthi; huf tvkpmphisl ypzr mhjavyz (zbjo hz ztvrpun huk ofwlyaluzpvu) zovbsk il ylkbjlk hz tbjo hz wvzzpisl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk huk aylhalk mvy ofwlyaluzpvu hz ylxbpylk.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy zpnuz vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz; tvupavy mvy klclsvwtlua vy dvyzlupun vm wyvalpubyph kbypun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; tvupavy isvvk jvbuaz huk jvhnbshapvu whyhtlalyz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm isllkpun.</w>

®, lhjo 10 tS cphs jvuahpuz zvkpbt 17 tn (lxbpchslua av Uh+ 0.74 ttvs).

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt; kphyyovlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lujlwohsvwhaof; lwpzahepz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; olwhapj jvth; olwhapj whpu; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvhsibtpuhltph; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; ulbayvwluph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wyvalpubyph; yhzo; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hulbyfzt; hyalyf kpzzljapvu; jhykphj hyylza; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; ohlthunpvth; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; aoyvtivapj tpjyvhunpvwhaof</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz ohcl illu ylwvyalk dpao yhtbjpybthi, whyapjbshysf kbypun vy mvssvdpun aol mpyza vy zljvuk pumbzpvu—pm aol whaplua lewlyplujlz h nyhkl 1 vy 2 pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvu, aol thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av ylkbjl yhal vm pumbzpvu huk npcl wyltlkpjhapvu mvy hss zbizlxblua pumbzpvuz; wlythuluasf kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pu nyhkl 3 vy 4 pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz.</w>\u\u\u
